text: Nayi, e yi a falama a xa nɛn, e naxa, “Xuini ito fala: Xiboleti.” Koni, na kanna fan yi a falama nɛn, a naxa, “Siboleti” bayo a mi yi nɔɛ a falɛ a kiini. Nayi, Galadi kaane yi a suxuma nɛn, e yi a kɔɛ raxaba Yurudɛn baan dɛ. Na waxatini, e yi muxu wuli tonge naanin muxu wuli firin naxɔri Efirami yi.
